item.title: Version 2.0.0
item.description:
üéâ CiteTrack v2.0.0 - Professional Charts & Analytics System

üöÄ Major Release - Complete Chart System

CiteTrack v2.0.0 transforms from a simple monitoring tool into a comprehensive academic citation analytics platform with professional-grade data visualization and management capabilities.

üìä New Chart System

  • Interactive Visualizations: Line charts, bar charts, and area charts with real-time data
  • Historical Tracking: Complete citation history with Core Data persistence
  • Time Range Filtering: View data by week, month, quarter, year, or custom ranges
  • Advanced Analytics: Trend analysis, growth rates, and statistical insights
  • Data Export: Export charts and data to CSV/JSON formats
  • Apple-Style UI: Native date pickers with fixed calendar display issues

üíæ Enhanced Data Management

  • Core Data Integration: Robust data persistence with automatic migration
  • iCloud Sync: Optional cloud synchronization across devices
  • Data Repair Tools: Built-in tools for data validation and repair
  • Background Collection: Intelligent data collection with configurable intervals

üîî Smart Notification System

  • Intelligent Alerts: Smart detection of citation count changes
  • Configurable Thresholds: Customizable notification settings
  • Multi-language Support: Notifications in your preferred language

üåç Complete Multilingual Support

  • 7 Languages: English, Chinese, Japanese, Korean, Spanish, French, German
  • Auto-detection: Automatically detects system language
  • Live Switching: Change languages without restarting the app

üé® Modern User Interface

  • Native macOS Design: Follows Apple's Human Interface Guidelines
  • Dark Mode Support: Seamless adaptation to system themes
  • Responsive Layout: Optimized for different window sizes
  • Professional Menu Bar: Lightweight integration with status indicators

üöÄ How to Access Charts

After updating: Click the menu bar icon and select "Charts" to explore the new visualization features!

üìä Technical Specifications

  • Application Size: ~4.9MB (with charts)
  • System Requirements: macOS 10.15+
  • Architecture: Universal (Intel & Apple Silicon)
  • New Frameworks: Core Data, UserNotifications
